1.1.name: wordpress/linkedin-inshare-button
1.1.description:
Automatically add InShare buttons to your posts. It works for single pages and loops. The plugin features an options page in which the following can be configured:

Display options:

  • Toggle hiding of button in loops

Display style:

  • Show button on top or bottom of post
  • Choose button display style (counter top,counter right,default)
  • Add breaks before and/or after the button
  • Button preview
  • Custom styling option, adds a containing div with classname which you can style in your stylesheet (new since 1.1)
